description:
Graham Dumpleton

JupyterHub is used to run and manage Jupyter notebook instances for multiple users at the same time. Did you know though that you can use JupyterHub to spawn applications other than Jupyter notebooks? Come see how JupyterHub was used to create a multi user interactive training environment.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/building-an-interactive-training-environment-using-jupyterhub

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sat Aug  3 11:50:00 2019 at C3.6
title: Building an interactive training environment using JupyterHub
